languages.text: "Надеюсь, твой ответ изменится вскоре. Я буду ждать этого больше, чем вызволения из Темного города".

traits.locale_text: "Это потому... что ты еще не простил{mf||а} меня, элантах?" {n}Тело эльдарки вытягивается, словно струна, и голос ее срывается".{/n} "Надеюсь, твой ответ изменится вскоре. Я буду ждать этого больше, чем вызволения из Темного города".

languages.text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, твой ответ изменится вскоре. Я буду ждать этого больше, чем вызволения из Темного города".

traits.locale_text: "Is that because... you still haven't forgiven me, elantach?" {n}The Aeldari's body straightens up like a string, and her voice falters.{/n} "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

"Is that because... you still haven't forgiven me, elantach?" {n}The Aeldari's body straightens up like a string, and her voice falters.{/n} "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

"Is that because... you still haven't forgiven me, elantach?" {n}The Aeldari's body straightens up like a string and her voice falters.{/n} "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

"Is that because... you still haven't forgiven me, elantach?" {n}The Aeldari's body straightens up like a string and her voice falters.{/n} "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."
"I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."
"I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

languages.text: “我希望你能很快改变想法。我渴切地等待你的答复，比在黑暗之城等待救赎时更加渴切。”
languages.original_text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: “这是因为……你还没有原谅我吗，外界人？”{n}伊莉耶特的身体像弓弦一样绷得笔直，声音不住地颤抖着。{/n}“我希望你能很快改变想法。我渴切地等待你的答复，比在黑暗之城等待救赎时更加渴切。”

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Eure Antwort ändert sich bald. Ich warte sehnsüchtiger darauf als auf die Befreiung aus der Dunklen Stadt."
languages.original_text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Weil ... weil Ihr mir noch immer nicht vergeben habt, Elantach?" {n}Die Aeldari richtet sich kerzengerade auf und ihre Stimme bricht.{/n} "Ich hoffe, Eure Antwort ändert sich bald. Ich warte sehnsüchtiger darauf als auf die Befreiung aus der Dunklen Stadt."

languages.text: «Confío en que tu respuesta cambie. Aguardaré con más ahínco de lo que esperé ser liberada de la Ciudad Siniestra».
languages.original_text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es porque... todavía no me has perdonado, elantach?». {n}El cuerpo de la Aeldari se tensa como una cuerda, y su voz se quiebra.{/n} «Confío en que tu respuesta cambie. Aguardaré con más ahínco de lo que esperé ser liberada de la Ciudad Siniestra».

languages.text: « Est-ce parce que... vous ne m'avez pas encore pardonnée, elantach ? J'espère que vous changerez vite d'avis. J'attendrai ce moment plus impatiemment encore que je n'ai attendu ma libération de la Cité Crépusculaire. »
languages.original_text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari se raidit soudainement et sa voix se fait tremblante.{/n} « Est-ce parce que... vous ne m'avez pas encore pardonnée, elantach ? J'espère que vous changerez vite d'avis. J'attendrai ce moment plus impatiemment encore que je n'ai attendu ma libération de la Cité Crépusculaire. »

languages.text: 「その答えがすぐに変わることを願っている。仄暗き都から解放されるのを待った以上に、私はそれを待ち望んでいる」
languages.original_text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: 「その理由は…まだ私を許してないからだろうか、エランタ？」{n}アエルダリは糸のようにまっすぐ体を伸ばすと、口ごもった。{/n}「その答えがすぐに変わることを願っている。仄暗き都から解放されるのを待った以上に、私はそれを待ち望んでいる」

languages.text: "Umarım bu kararın yakında değişir. Kara Şehir'den kurtulmayı bekleyişimdekinden daha büyük bir hevesle bekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I hope your answer changes soon. I will await it more eagerly than I waited to be freed from the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım bu kararın yakında değişir. Kara Şehir'den kurtulmayı bekleyişimdekinden daha büyük bir hevesle bekleyeceğim."
